message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'll love! I'm offering it to you for $150. Let me know what you think.
Hi Alice, $150 is a bit steep for me.  I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $80.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While $80 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $100. This is still a great deal considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $100, but I'm still only able to pay $85.  If you're willing to meet me halfway, I'm ready to buy the product right now.
